screen_desc: The screenshot shows the search screen of Facebook Messenger. At the top, there is a search bar with the text "facebook messenger" entered. The page appears empty with no search results displayed. There are navigation options at the top and bottom, including a back arrow and close button.
history_actions: click on the Google Play Store app located at the bottom.
click on the search icon (a magnifying glass) located at the top-right corner of the screen.
